2854  return it.is_seed();
2855  } );
2856

2860  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );

2865

2868  harvest_plant( you, examp, false );
2869  } else if( !here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) ) {
2870  if( here.i_at( examp ).size() > 1 ) {
2871  add_msg( m_info, _( "This %s has already been fertilized." ), pname );
2872  return;

2878  }

3042  next_arcfurnace_type = furn_f_arcfurnace_full;
3043  } else {
3044  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_empty, but is of type %s",
3045  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3046  return;
3047  }
3048 
3049  static const std::set<material_id> arcfurnaceable{ material_cac2powder };
3050  bool fuel_present = false;
3051  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3052  for( const item &i : items ) {
3053  if( i.typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
3054  add_msg( _( "This furnace already contains calcium carbide." ) );
3055  add_msg( _( "Remove it before activating the arc furnace again." ) );
3056  return;
3057  } else if( i.made_of_any( arcfurnaceable ) ) {
3058  fuel_present = true;
3059  } else {
3060  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This furnace contains %s, which can't be made into calcium carbide!" ),
3061  i.tname( 1, false ) );
3062  return;
3063  }
3064  }
3065 
3066  if( !fuel_present ) {
3067  add_msg( _( "This furnace is empty. Fill it with powdered coke and lime mix, and try again." ) );
3068  return;
3069  }
3070 
3071  ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a furnace
3072  const float skill = you.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
3073  int loss = 60 - 2 *
3074  skill; // Inefficiency is still fine, coal and limestone is abundant
3075 
3076  // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
3077  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
3078  for( const item &i : items ) {
3079  total_volume += i.volume();
3080  }
3081 
3082  const itype *char_type = item::find_type( itype_unfinished_cac2 );
3083  int char_charges = char_type->charges_per_volume( ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100 );
3084  if( char_charges < 1 ) {
3085  add_msg( _( "The batch in this furnace is too small to yield usable calcium carbide." ) );
3086  return;
3087  }
3088  //arc furnaces require a huge amount of current, so 1 full storage battery would work as a stand in
3089  if( you.available_ups() < 1250_kJ ) {
3090  add_msg( _( "This furnace is ready to be turned on, but you lack a UPS with sufficient power." ) );
3091  return;
3092  } else {
3093  add_msg( _( "This furnace contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be turned on." ),
3094  format_volume( total_volume ), volume_units_abbr() );
3095  if( !query_yn( _( "Turn on the furnace?" ) ) ) {
3096  return;
3097  }
3098  }
3099 
3100  you.consume_ups( 1250_kJ );
3101  here.i_clear( examp );
3102  here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
3103  item result( "unfinished_cac2", calendar::turn );
3104  result.charges = char_charges;
3105  here.add_item( examp, result );

3113  furn_id next_arcfurnace_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();

3115  next_arcfurnace_type = furn_f_arcfurnace_empty;
3116  } else {
3117  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_full, but is of type %s",
3118  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3119  return;
3120  }
3121 
3122  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3123  if( items.empty() ) {
3124  add_msg( _( "This furnace is empty" ) );
3125  here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
3126  return;
3127  }
3128  const itype *char_type = item::find_type( itype_chem_carbide );
3129  add_msg( _( "There's an arc furnace there." ) );
3130  const time_duration firing_time = 2_hours; // Arc furnaces work really fast in reality
3131  const time_duration time_left = firing_time - items.only_item().age();
3132  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
3133  int hours = to_hours<int>( time_left );
3134  int minutes = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
3135  if( minutes > 60 ) {
3136  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish burning in about %d hour.",
3137  "It will finish burning in about %d hours.",
3138  hours ), hours );
3139  } else if( minutes > 30 ) {
3140  add_msg( _( "It will finish burning in less than an hour." ) );
3141  } else {
3142  add_msg( n_gettext( "It should take about %d minute to finish burning.",
3143  "It should take about %d minutes to finish burning.",
3144  minutes ), minutes );
3145  }
3146  return;
3147  }
3148 
3149  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
3150  // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
3151  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
3152  if( item_it->typeId() == itype_unfinished_cac2 || item_it->typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
3153  total_volume += item_it->volume();
3154  item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3155  } else {
3156  item_it++;
3157  }
3158  }
3159 
3160  item result( "chem_carbide", calendar::turn );
3161  result.charges = char_type->charges_per_volume( total_volume );
3162  here.add_item( examp, result );
3163  here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
3164  add_msg( _( "It has finished burning, yielding %d calcium carbide." ), result.charges );
3165 }

void iexamine::attunement_altar ( Character &  you,

Definition at line 576 of file iexamine.cpp.

577 {
578  std::set<trait_id> attunements;
579  for( const mutation_branch &mut : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
580  if( mut.flags.count( json_flag_ATTUNEMENT ) ) {
581  attunements.emplace( mut.id );
582  }
583  }
584  // remove the attunements the player does not have prereqs for
585  for( auto iter = attunements.begin(); iter != attunements.end(); ) {
586  bool has_prereq = true;
587  // the normal usage of prereqs only needs one, but attunements put all their prereqs into the same array
588  // each prereqs is required for it as well
589  for( const trait_id &prereq : ( *iter )->prereqs ) {
590  if( !you.has_trait( prereq ) ) {
591  has_prereq = false;
592  break;
593  }
594  }
595  if( has_prereq ) {
596  ++iter;
597  } else {
598  iter = attunements.erase( iter );
599  }
600  }
601  if( attunements.empty() ) {
602  // the player doesn't have at least two base classes
603  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "This altar gives you the creeps." ) );
604  return;
605  }
606  // remove the attunements the player has conflicts for
607  for( auto iter = attunements.begin(); iter != attunements.end(); ) {
608  if( !you.has_opposite_trait( *iter ) && you.mutation_ok( *iter, true, true, true ) ) {
609  ++iter;
610  } else {
611  iter = attunements.erase( iter );
612  }
613  }
614  if( attunements.empty() ) {
615  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You've attained what you can for now." ) );
616  return;
617  }
618  for( auto iter = attunements.begin(); iter != attunements.end(); ) {
619  if( has_attunement_spell_prereqs( you, *iter ) ) {
620  ++iter;
621  } else {
622  iter = attunements.erase( iter );
623  }
624  }
625  if( attunements.empty() ) {
626  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You feel that the altar does not deem you worthy, yet." ) );
627  return;
628  }
629  uilist attunement_list;
630  attunement_list.title = _( "Pick an Attunement to show the world your Worth." );
631  for( const trait_id &attunement : attunements ) {
632  // There's no way for you to have this mutation, so a variant is pointless
633  attunement_list.addentry( attunement->name() );
634  }
635  attunement_list.query();
636  if( attunement_list.ret == UILIST_CANCEL ) {
637  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "Maybe later." ) );
638  return;
639  }
640  auto attunement_iter = attunements.begin();
641  std::advance( attunement_iter, attunement_list.ret );
642  const trait_id &attunement = *attunement_iter;
643  // There's no way for you to have this mutation, so a variant is pointless
644  if( query_yn( string_format( _( "Are you sure you want to pick %s? This selection is permanent." ),
645  attunement->name() ) ) ) {
646  you.toggle_trait( attunement );
647  // There's no way for you to have this mutation, so a variant is pointless
648  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, attunement->desc() );
649  } else {
650  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "Maybe later." ) );
651  }
652 }

5868  }
5869  }

5871  }
5872 
5873  case UNINSTALL_CBM: {
5874  const bionic_collection &installed_bionics = *patient.my_bionics;
5875  if( installed_bionics.empty() ) {
5876  popup_player_or_npc( patient, _( "You don't have any bionics installed." ),
5877  _( "<npcname> doesn't have any bionics installed." ) );
5878  return;
5879  }
5880 
5881  std::vector<bionic_id> bio_list;
5882  std::vector<std::string> bionic_names;
5883  std::vector<const bionic *> bionics;
5884  for( const bionic &bio : installed_bionics ) {
5885  if( item::type_is_defined( bio.info().itype() ) ) {
5886  bio_list.emplace_back( bio.id );
5887  bionic_names.emplace_back( bio.info().name.translated() );
5888  bionics.push_back( &bio );
5889  }
5890  }
5891  int bionic_index = uilist( _( "Choose bionic to uninstall" ), bionic_names );
5892  if( bionic_index < 0 ) {
5893  return;
5894  }
5895 
5896  const bionic_id &bid = bio_list[bionic_index];
5897  const int difficulty = bid->itype()->bionic->difficulty;
5898  const float volume_anesth = difficulty * 20 * 2; // 2ml/min
5899 
5900  Character &installer = best_installer( you, null_player, difficulty );
5901  if( &installer == &null_player ) {
5902  return;
5903  }
5904 
5905  if( patient.can_uninstall_bionic( *bionics[bionic_index], installer, true ) ) {
5906  const time_duration duration = difficulty * 20_minutes;
5907  patient.introduce_into_anesthesia( duration, installer, needs_anesthesia );
5908  if( needs_anesthesia ) {
5909  you.consume_tools( anesth_kit, volume_anesth );
5910  }
5911  installer.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) );
5912  patient.uninstall_bionic( *bionics[bionic_index], installer, true );
5913  }
5914  break;
5915  }
5916 
5917  case BONESETTING: {
5918  if( arm_splints.empty() && leg_splints.empty() ) {
5919  popup( _( "Internal supply of splints exhausted. Operation impossible. Exiting." ) );
5920  return;
5921  }
5922 
5923  int broken_limbs_count = 0;
5924  for( const bodypart_id &part :
5925  patient.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
5926  const bool broken = patient.is_limb_broken( part );
5927  effect &existing_effect = patient.get_effect( effect_mending, part );
5928  // Skip part if not broken or already healed 50%
5929  if( !broken || ( !existing_effect.is_null() &&
5930  existing_effect.get_duration() >
5931  existing_effect.get_max_duration() - 5_days - 1_turns ) ) {
5932  continue;
5933  }
5934  broken_limbs_count++;
5935  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
5936  // TODO: fail here if unable to perform the action, i.e. can't wear more, trait mismatch.
5937  int quantity = 1;
5938  if( part == bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) || part == bodypart_id( "arm_r" ) ) {
5939  if( !arm_splints.empty() ) {
5940  for( const item &it : get_map().use_amount( examp, 1, itype_arm_splint, quantity ) ) {
5941  patient.wear_item( it, false );
5942  }
5943  } else {
5944  popup( _( "Internal supply of arm splints exhausted. Splinting broken arms impossible. Exiting." ) );
5945  continue;
5946  }
5947  } else if( part == bodypart_id( "leg_l" ) || part == bodypart_id( "leg_r" ) ) {
5948  if( !leg_splints.empty() ) {
5949  for( const item &it : get_map().use_amount( examp, 1, itype_leg_splint, quantity ) ) {
5950  patient.wear_item( it, false );
5951  }
5952  } else {
5953  popup( _( "Internal supply of leg splints exhausted. Splinting broken legs impossible. Exiting." ) );
5954  continue;
5955  }
5956  }
5957 
5958  if( patient.worn_with_flag( flag_SPLINT, part ) ) {
5959  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good, _( "The machine rapidly sets and splints your broken %s." ),
5960  _( "The machine rapidly sets and splints <npcname>'s broken %s." ),
5961  body_part_name( part ) );
5962  patient.add_effect( effect_mending, 0_turns, part, true );
5963  effect &mending_effect = patient.get_effect( effect_mending, part );
5964  mending_effect.set_duration( mending_effect.get_max_duration() - 5_days );
5965  }
5966  }
5967  if( broken_limbs_count == 0 ) {
5968  popup_player_or_npc( patient, _( "You have no limbs that require splinting." ),
5969  _( "<npcname> doesn't have limbs that require splinting." ) );
5970  }
5971  break;
5972  }
5973 
5974  case TREAT_WOUNDS: {
5975  if( !patient.has_effect( effect_bleed ) && !patient.has_effect( effect_infected ) &&
5976  !patient.has_effect( effect_bite ) ) {
5977  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info, _( "You don't have any wounds that need treatment." ),
5978  _( "<npcname> doesn't have any wounds that need treatment." ) );
5979  return;
5980  }
5981 
5982  if( patient.has_effect( effect_infected ) || patient.has_effect( effect_tetanus ) ) {
5983  if( patient.has_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic ) ||
5984  patient.has_effect( effect_antibiotic ) ||
5985  patient.has_effect( effect_weak_antibiotic ) ) {
5986  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
5987  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in your body, but as it also detected you've already taken antibiotics, it decided not to apply another dose right now." ),
5988  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in <npcname>'s body, but as it also detected they've already taken antibiotics, it decided not to apply another dose right now." ) );
5989  } else {
5990  patient.add_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic, 12_hours );
5991  patient.add_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
5992  patient.mod_pain( 3 );
5993  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
5994  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in your body and injected antibiotics to treat it." ),
5995  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in <npcname>'s body and injected antibiotics to treat it." ) );
5996 
5997  if( patient.has_effect( effect_tetanus ) ) {
5998  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
5999  patient.remove_effect( effect_tetanus );
6000  patient.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The muscle spasms start to go away." ) );
6001  } else {
6002  patient.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The medication does nothing to help the spasms." ) );
6003  }
6004  }
6005  }
6006  }
6007 
6008  for( const bodypart_id &bp_healed :
6009  patient.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
6010  if( patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed.id() ) ) {
6011  patient.remove_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed );
6012  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
6013  _( "The Autodoc detected ongoing blood loss from your %s and administered you hemostatic drugs to stop it." ),
6014  _( "The Autodoc detected ongoing blood loss from <npcname>'s %s and administered them hemostatic drugs to stop it." ),
6015  body_part_name( bp_healed ) );
6016  }
6017 
6018  if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed.id() ) ) {
6019  patient.remove_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed );
6020  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
6021  _( "The Autodoc detected an open wound on your %s and applied disinfectant to sterilize it." ),
6022  _( "The Autodoc detected an open wound on <npcname>'s %s and applied disinfectant to sterilize it." ),
6023  body_part_name( bp_healed ) );
6024 
6025  // Fixed disinfectant intensity of 4 disinfectant_power + 10 first aid skill level of Autodoc.
6026  const int disinfectant_intensity = 14;
6027  patient.add_effect( effect_disinfected, 1_turns, bp_healed );
6028  effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_disinfected, bp_healed );
6029  e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * disinfectant_intensity );
6030  patient.set_part_damage_disinfected( bp_healed,
6031  patient.get_part_hp_max( bp_healed ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp_healed ) );
6032  }
6033  }
6034  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
6035  break;
6036  }
6037 
6038  case RAD_AWAY: {
6039  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
6040  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
6041  _( "The Autodoc scanned you and detected a radiation level of %d mSv." ),
6042  _( "The Autodoc scanned <npcname> and detected a radiation level of %d mSv." ),
6043  patient.get_rad() );
6044  if( patient.get_rad() ) {
6045  if( patient.has_effect( effect_pblue ) ) {
6046  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
6047  _( "The Autodoc detected an anti-radiation drug in your bloodstream, so it decided not to administer you another dose right now." ),
6048  _( "The Autodoc detected an anti-radiation drug in <npcname>'s bloodstream, so it decided not to administer them another dose right now." ) );
6049  } else {
6050  add_msg( m_good,
6051  _( "The Autodoc administered an anti-radiation drug to treat radiation poisoning." ) );
6052  patient.mod_pain( 3 );
6053  patient.add_effect( effect_pblue, 1_hours );
6054  }
6055  }
6056  if( static_cast<int>( patient.get_leak_level() ) ) {
6057  popup( _( "Warning! Autodoc detected a radiation leak of %d mSv from items in patient's possession. Urgent decontamination procedures highly recommended." ),
6058  static_cast<int>( patient.get_leak_level() ) );
6059  }
6060  break;
6061  }
6062 
6063  case BLOOD_ANALYSIS: {
6064  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
6065  patient.conduct_blood_analysis();
6066  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
6067  _( "The Autodoc analyzed your blood." ),
6068  _( "The Autodoc analyzed <npcname>'s blood." ) );
6069  break;
6070  }
6071 
6072  default:
6073  return;
6074  }
6075 }

Prompt climbing over fence.

Calculates move cost, applies it to player and moves them.

1550 
1551  if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {

1554  } else {
1555  add_msg( _( "You vault over the obstacle." ) );
1556  move_cost = 300; // Most common move cost for barricades pre-change.
1557  }
1558  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_ARACHNID_ARMS_OK ) &&
1559  !you.wearing_fitting_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1560  add_msg( _( "Climbing this obstacle is trivial for one such as you." ) );
1561  move_cost = 75; // Yes, faster than walking. 6-8 limbs are impressive.
1562  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_INSECT_ARMS_OK ) &&
1563  !you.wearing_fitting_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1564  add_msg( _( "You quickly scale the fence." ) );
1565  move_cost = 90;
1566  } else if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
1567  add_msg( _( "This obstacle is no match for your freerunning abilities." ) );
1568  move_cost = 100;
1569  } else {
1570  move_cost = you.has_trait( trait_BADKNEES ) ? 800 : 400;
1571  if( g->slip_down( game::climb_maneuver::over_obstacle, climbing_aid_furn_CLIMBABLE ) ) {
1572  you.mod_moves( -move_cost );
1573  return;
1574  }
1575  }
1576  Character &player_character = get_player_character();

1578  sfx::get_heard_volume( player_character.pos() ) );

1580  "Move cost to vault: %d, limb score modifier %.1f", move_cost,
1581  you.get_modifier( character_modifier_obstacle_climb_mod ) );
1582  move_cost /= you.get_modifier( character_modifier_obstacle_climb_mod );
1583  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE,
1584  "Final move cost %d", move_cost );
1585  you.mod_moves( -move_cost );
1586  if( you.in_vehicle ) {
1587  here.unboard_vehicle( you.pos() );
1588  }

3757 {
3758  itype_id compost_type;
3759  std::string compost_nname;
3760  bool to_deposit = false;
3761  static const auto tank_volume = units::from_liter( 1000 );
3762  bool tank_full = false;
3763  bool ferment = false;
3764  bool compost_present = false;
3765  int charges_on_ground = 0;
3766  map &here = get_map();
3767  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3768  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
3769  if( !item_it->is_compostable() || compost_present ) {
3770  // This isn't a biomass or there was already another kind of biomass inside,
3771  // so this has to be moved.
3772  items.insert( *item_it );
3773  // This will add items to a space near the tank, because it's flagged as NOITEM.
3774  item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3775  } else {
3776  item_it++;
3777  compost_present = true;
3778  }
3779  }
3780  if( !compost_present ) {
3781  add_msg( _( "This tank is empty." ) );
3782  // TODO: Allow using biomass from crafting inventory
3783  const auto b_inv = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_compostable", &item::is_compostable );
3784  if( b_inv.empty() ) {
3785  add_msg( m_info, _( "You have no biomass to ferment." ) );
3786  return;
3787  }
3788  // Make lists of unique typeids and names for the menu
3789  // Code shamelessly stolen from the crop planting function!
3790  std::vector<itype_id> b_types;
3791  std::vector<std::string> b_names;
3792  for( const item *b : b_inv ) {
3793  if( std::find( b_types.begin(), b_types.end(), b->typeId() ) == b_types.end() ) {
3794  b_types.push_back( b->typeId() );
3795  b_names.push_back( item::nname( b->typeId() ) );
3796  }
3797  }
3798  // Choose biomass from list
3799  int b_index = 0;
3800  if( b_types.size() > 1 ) {
3801  b_index = uilist( _( "Use which biomass?" ), b_names );
3802  } else { //Only one biomass type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
3803  if( !query_yn( _( "Set %s in the tank?" ), b_names[0] ) ) {
3804  b_index = -1;
3805  }
3806  }
3807  if( b_index < 0 ) {
3808  return;
3809  }
3810  to_deposit = true;
3811  compost_type = b_types[b_index];
3812  compost_nname = item::nname( compost_type );
3813  } else {
3814  item &compost = here.i_at( examp ).only_item();
3815  compost_type = compost.typeId();
3816  compost_nname = item::nname( compost_type );
3817  charges_on_ground = compost.charges;
3818  add_msg( _( "This tank contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3819  compost.tname(), compost.charges, compost.volume() * 100.0 / tank_volume );
3820  enum options { ADD_COMPOST, REMOVE_COMPOST, START_FERMENT };
3821  uilist selectmenu;
3822  selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
3823  selectmenu.addentry( ADD_COMPOST, ( you.charges_of( compost_type ) > 0 ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3824  _( "Add more %s to the tank" ), compost_nname );
3825  selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_COMPOST, compost.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3826  _( "Remove %s from the tank" ), compost.tname() );
3827  selectmenu.addentry( START_FERMENT, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Start anaerobic digestion" ) );
3828  selectmenu.query();
3829  switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
3830  case ADD_COMPOST: {
3831  to_deposit = true;
3832  break;
3833  }
3834  case REMOVE_COMPOST: {
3835  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( here.i_at( examp ).begin(), examp );
3836  return;
3837  }
3838  case START_FERMENT: {
3839  ferment = true;
3840  break;
3841  }
3842  default:
3843  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3844  return;
3845  }
3846  }
3847  if( to_deposit ) {
3848  item compost( compost_type, calendar::turn_zero );
3849  int charges_held = you.charges_of( compost_type );
3850  compost.charges = charges_on_ground;
3851  for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !tank_full; i++ ) {
3852  you.use_charges( compost_type, 1 );
3853  compost.charges++;
3854  if( compost.volume() >= tank_volume ) {
3855  tank_full = true;
3856  }
3857  }
3858  add_msg( _( "Set %s in the tank." ), compost_nname );
3859  add_msg( _( "The tank now contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3860  compost.tname(), compost.charges, compost.volume() * 100.0 / tank_volume );
3861  here.i_clear( examp );
3862  //This is needed to bypass NOITEM
3863  here.add_item( examp, compost );
3864  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) );
3865  if( !tank_full ) {
3866  ferment = query_yn( _( "Start anaerobic digestion?" ) );
3867  }
3868  }
3869  if( tank_full || ferment ) {
3870  here.i_at( examp ).only_item().set_age( 0_turns );
3871  compost_set_full( examp );
3872  if( tank_full ) {
3873  add_msg( _( "The tank is full, so you close the lid and start anaerobic digestion." ) );
3874  } else {
3875  add_msg( _( "You close the lid and start anaerobic digestion." ) );
3876  }
3877  // Set timer for biogas production

3880  item &ferm = *items_here.end();
3881  ferm.set_birthday( calendar::turn );
3882  }

3912  // Biogas generating process starts after one month.
3913  int gas_gatherable = fermented_days < 30 ? fermented_days : fermented_days - 30 ;
3914  int max_gas_gatherable = gas_gatherable < 5 ? gas_gatherable : 5 ;

3921  const time_duration progress = compost_i.age();
3922  if( progress < compost_time ) {
3923  int hours = to_hours<int>( compost_time - progress );
3924  int days = to_days<int>( compost_time - progress );
3925  if( hours < 1 ) {
3926  add_msg( _( "It will finish fermenting in less than an hour." ) );
3927  } else if( days < 1 ) {
3928  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish fermenting in about %d hour.",

3931  } else {
3932  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish fermenting in about %d day.",
3933  "It will finish fermenting in about %d days.",
3934  days ), days );
3935  }
3936  if( to_days<int>( progress ) >= 30 && gas_gatherable >= 1 ) {
3937  if( query_yn( _( "Gather biogas? Can't stop once releasing started." ) ) ) {
3938  const std::map<itype_id, int> results = compost_i.composting_results();
3939  const int count = compost_i.count();
3940  const time_point gas_birthday = compost_i.birthday();

3942  add_msg( _( "No biogas gathered." ) );
3943  } else {
3944  for( const std::pair<const itype_id, int> &result : results ) {
3945  item biogas( result.first, gas_birthday );
3946  // 40 L biogas for 1 KG of biomass over the whole anaerobic digestion process.
3947  // 1 unit of biomass(0.5 KG) for 80 units(0.25 L for each unit) of biogas.
3948  int gas_amount = count * max_gas_gatherable * 80 / 30;
3949  if( result.first->phase == phase_id::GAS ) {
3950  if( !you.can_pickVolume_partial( biogas ) ) {
3951  add_msg( _( "You released some biogas from the tank." ) );
3952  } else {
3953  biogas.charges = result.second;
3954  you.i_add_or_drop( biogas, gas_amount );
3955  add_msg( _( "Gathered %s units of biogas." ), gas_amount );
3956  }
3957  }
3958  }
3959  }
3960  add_msg( n_gettext( "Biogas generating process started for about %d day.",
3961  "Biogas generating process started for about %d days.",
3962  max_gas_gatherable ), max_gas_gatherable );
3963  ferm.set_birthday( calendar::turn );
3964  }
3965  }
3966  return;
3967  }
3968

344  e.made_of( material_hc_steel ) || e.made_of( material_lc_steel ) ||
345  e.made_of( material_mc_steel ) || e.made_of( material_qt_steel ) );
346  }, _( "Apply diamond coating" ), 1, _( "You don't have a suitable item to coat with diamond" ) );
347 
348  if( !loc ) {
349  return;
350  }
351 
352  // Require materials proportional to selected item volume
353  auto qty = loc->volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor;
354  qty = std::max( 1, qty );
355  requirement_data reqs = *requirement_data_cvd_diamond * qty;
356 
357  if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( you.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
358  popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
359  return;
360  }
361 
362  // Consume materials
363  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
364  you.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
365  }
366  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
367  you.consume_tools( e );
368  }
369  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
370 
371  // Apply flag to item
372  loc->set_flag( flag_DIAMOND );
373  add_msg( m_good, _( "You apply a diamond coating to your %s" ), loc->type_name() );
374  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
375 }

2767 {
2768  ret_val<void> can_fert = can_fertilize( you, tile, fertilizer );
2769  if( !can_fert.success() ) {
2770  debugmsg( can_fert.str() );
2771  return;
2772  }
2773 
2774  std::list<item> planted;
2775  if( fertilizer->count_by_charges() ) {
2776  planted = you.use_charges( fertilizer, 1 );
2777  } else {
2778  planted = you.use_amount( fertilizer, 1 );
2779  }
2780 
2781  // Reduce the amount of time it takes until the next stage of the plant by
2782  // 20% of a seasons length. (default 2.8 days).
2783  const time_duration fertilizerEpoch = calendar::season_length() * 0.2;
2784 
2785  map &here = get_map();
2786  // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2787  map_stack items = here.i_at( tile );
2788  const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2789  return it.is_seed();
2790  } );
2791  if( seed == items.end() ) {
2792  debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", tile.x, tile.y, tile.z );
2793  here.i_clear( tile );
2794  here.furn_set( tile, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2795  return;
2796  }
2797

2799  seed->set_birthday( seed->birthday() - fertilizerEpoch );
2800  // The plant furniture has the NOITEM token which prevents adding items on that square,
2801  // spawned items are moved to an adjacent field instead, but the fertilizer token
2802  // must be on the square of the plant, therefore this hack:
2803  const furn_id old_furn = here.furn( tile );
2804  here.furn_set( tile, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2805  here.spawn_item( tile, itype_fertilizer, 1, 1, calendar::turn );
2806  here.furn_set( tile, old_furn );
2807  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
2808

3475  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );

void iexamine::flower_poppy ( Character &  you,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Prompt pick (or drink nectar if able) poppy bud.

Not safe for player.

Drinking causes: -25 hunger, +20 sleepiness, pkill2-70 effect and, 1 in 20 pkiller-1 addiction. Picking w/ env_resist < 5 causes 1 in 3 sleep for 12 min and 4 dmg to each leg

2098  return;

2101  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
2102  tripoint tmp;
2103  tmp.z = examp.z;
2104  for( tmp.y = examp.y; tmp.y <= examp.y + 5; tmp.y++ ) {

2109  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_red );
2110  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_red ) {
2111  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_red );

2113  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_green );
2114  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_green ) {
2115  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_green );

2120  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_blue ) {
2121  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_blue );
2122  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_green ) {
2123  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_green );
2124  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_green ) {
2125  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_green );
2126  }
2127  } else if( terid == ter_t_switch_rb ) {
2128  if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_blue ) {
2129  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_blue );
2130  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_blue ) {
2131  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_blue );
2132  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_red ) {
2133  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_red );
2134  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_red ) {
2135  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_red );
2136  }
2137  } else if( terid == ter_t_switch_even ) {
2138  if( ( tmp.y - examp.y ) % 2 == 1 ) {
2139  if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_red ) {
2140  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_red );
2141  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_red ) {
2142  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_red );
2143  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_green ) {
2144  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_green );
2145  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_green ) {
2146  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_green );
2147  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_blue ) {
2148  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_blue );
2149  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_blue ) {
2150  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_blue );
2151  }
2152  }
2153  }
2154  }
2155  }
2156  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You hear the rumble of rock shifting." ) );

3543  // This isn't a brew or there was already another kind of brew inside,
3544  // so this has to be moved.

3577  b_index = -1;
3578  }
3579  }
3580  if( b_index < 0 ) {

3601  selectmenu.query();

3603  case ADD_BREW: {
3604  to_deposit = true;
3605  break;
3606  }
3607  case REMOVE_BREW: {
3608  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( here.i_at( examp ).begin(), examp );

3610  }

3612  ferment = true;
3613  break;
3614  }
3615  default:
3616  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3617  return;
3618  }
3619  }

3624  for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !vat_full; i++ ) {
3625  you.use_charges( brew_type, 1 );
3626  brew.charges++;
3627  if( brew.volume() >= vat_volume ) {
3628  vat_full = true;
3629  }
3630  }
3631  add_msg( _( "Set %s in the vat." ), brew_nname );

Use "gas pump.".

Will pump any liquids on tile.

Note
Dexterity decreases chance of spilling gas from a pump
Note
Dexterity decreases amount of gas spilled, if gas is spilled from pump

527  none( you, examp );
528  return;
529  }
530 
531  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
532  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ++item_it ) {
533  if( item_it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
534  /// @note \EFFECT_DEX decreases chance of spilling gas from a pump
535  if( one_in( 10 + you.get_dex() ) ) {
536  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You accidentally spill the %s." ), item_it->type_name() );
537  static const auto max_spill_volume = units::from_liter( 1 );
538  const int max_spill_charges = std::max( 1, item_it->charges_per_volume( max_spill_volume ) );
539  /// @note \EFFECT_DEX decreases amount of gas spilled, if gas is spilled from pump
540  const int qty = rng( 1, max_spill_charges * 8.0 / std::max( 1, you.get_dex() ) );
541 
542  item spill = item_it->split( qty );
543  if( spill.is_null() ) {
544  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *item_it );
545  items.erase( item_it );
546  } else {
547  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), spill );
548  }
549 
550  } else {
551  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( item_it, examp, 1 );
552  }
553  return;
554  }
555  }

◆ get_harvest_items()

std::list< item > iexamine::get_harvest_items ( const itype &  type,
int  plant_count,
int  seed_count,
bool  byproducts 
)

Items that appear when a generic plant is harvested.

Seed islot_seed.

Parameters
typeThe seed type, must have a itype::seed slot.
plant_countNumber of fruits to generate. For charge-based items, this specifies multiples of the default charge.
seed_countNumber of seeds to generate.
byproductsIf true, byproducts (like straw, withered plants, see islot_seed::byproducts) are included.

Definition at line 2592 of file iexamine.cpp.

2594 {
2595  std::list<item> result;
2596  if( !type.seed ) {
2597  return result;
2598  }
2599  const islot_seed &seed_data = *type.seed;
2600  // This is a temporary measure, itype should instead provide appropriate accessors
2601  // to expose data about the seed item to allow harvesting to function.
2602  const itype_id &seed_type = type.get_id();
2603 
2604  const auto add = [&]( const itype_id & id, const int count ) {
2605  item new_item( id, calendar::turn );
2606  if( new_item.count_by_charges() && count > 0 ) {
2607  new_item.charges *= count;
2608  new_item.charges /= seed_data.fruit_div;
2609  if( new_item.charges <= 0 ) {
2610  new_item.charges = 1;
2611  }
2612  result.push_back( new_item );
2613  } else if( count > 0 ) {
2614  result.insert( result.begin(), count, new_item );
2615  }
2616  };
2617 
2618  if( seed_data.spawn_seeds ) {
2619  add( seed_type, seed_count );
2620  }
2621 
2622  add( seed_data.fruit_id, plant_count );
2623 
2624  if( byproducts ) {
2625  for( const itype_id &b : seed_data.byproducts ) {
2626  add( b, 1 );
2627  }
2628  }
2629 
2630  return result;
2631 }

4992

4994

5001

5003  continue;

5006  // Return a potentially empty tank, but only if we don't find a closer full one.
5007  tank_loc.emplace( tmp );
5008  }

5011  distance = new_distance;
5012  tank_loc.emplace( tmp );
5013  fuel_units = k.charges;
5014  break;
5015  }

5017  }

2705  you.has_trait( trait_M_FERTILE ) ) &&
2706  one_in( 2 ) ) ) {
2707  g->place_critter_at( mon_fungal_blossom, examp );

2709  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) || one_in( 4 ) ) {
2710  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_flower_marloss );
2711  add_msg( m_info, _( "The seed blossoms rather rapidly" ) );
2712  } else {
2713  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_flower_fungal );
2714  add_msg( m_info, _( "The seed blossoms into a flower-looking fungus." ) );
2715  }
2716  } else { // Generic seed, use the seed item data
2717  const inventory &crafting_inv = you.crafting_inventory();
2718  if( seed->has_flag( flag_CUT_HARVEST ) && !crafting_inv.has_quality( qual_GRASS_CUT ) ) {
2719  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You will need a grass-cutting tool to harvest this plant." ) );
2720  return;
2721  } else {
2722  const itype &type = *seed->type;
2723  player_activity act( ACT_HARVEST, to_moves<int>( 60_seconds ) );
2724  you.assign_activity( act );
2725  here.i_clear( examp );
2726 
2727  int skillLevel = round( you.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2728  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases number of plants harvested from a seed
2729  int plant_count = rng( skillLevel / 2, skillLevel );
2730  plant_count *= here.furn( examp )->plant->harvest_multiplier;
2731  plant_count = std::min( std::max( plant_count, 1 ), 12 );
2732  int seedCount = std::max( 1, rng( plant_count / 4, plant_count / 2 ) );
2733  for( item &i : get_harvest_items( type, plant_count, seedCount, true ) ) {
2734  if( from_activity ) {
2735  i.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
2736  }
2737  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), i );
2738  }
2739  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id( here.furn( examp )->plant->base ) );
2740  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You harvest the plant." ) );

◆ keg()

void iexamine::keg ( Character &  you,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Definition at line 4058 of file iexamine.cpp.

4059 {
4060  none( you, examp );
4061  map &here = get_map();
4062  const std::string keg_name = here.name( examp );
4063  const units::volume keg_cap = get_keg_capacity( examp );
4064 
4065  const bool has_container_with_liquid = map_cursor( examp ).has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
4066  return !it.is_container_empty() && it.can_unload_liquid();
4067  } );
4068  const bool liquid_present = map_cursor( examp ).has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
4069  return it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID );
4070  } );
4071 
4072  if( !liquid_present || has_container_with_liquid ) {
4073  add_msg( m_info, _( "It is empty." ) );
4074  // Get list of all drinks
4075  auto drinks_inv = you.items_with( []( const item & it ) {
4076  return it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID );
4077  } );
4078  if( drinks_inv.empty() ) {
4079  add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any drinks to fill the %s with." ), keg_name );
4080  return;
4081  }
4082  // Make lists of unique drinks... about third time we do this, maybe we ought to make a function next time
4083  std::vector<itype_id> drink_types;
4084  std::vector<std::string> drink_names;
4085  std::vector<double> drink_rot;
4086  std::vector<time_point> drink_bday;
4087  for( item *&drink : drinks_inv ) {
4088  auto found_drink = std::find( drink_types.begin(), drink_types.end(), drink->typeId() );
4089  if( found_drink == drink_types.end() ) {
4090  drink_types.push_back( drink->typeId() );
4091  drink_names.push_back( item::nname( drink->typeId() ) );
4092  drink_rot.push_back( drink->get_relative_rot() );
4093  drink_bday.push_back( drink->birthday() );
4094  } else {
4095  auto rot_iter = std::next( drink_rot.begin(), std::distance( drink_types.begin(), found_drink ) );
4096  // Yep, worst rot wins.
4097  *rot_iter = std::max( *rot_iter, drink->get_relative_rot() );
4098  }
4099  }
4100  // Choose drink to store in keg from list
4101  int drink_index = 0;
4102  if( drink_types.size() > 1 ) {
4103  drink_index = uilist( _( "Store which drink?" ), drink_names );
4104  if( drink_index < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( drink_index ) >= drink_types.size() ) {
4105  drink_index = -1;
4106  }
4107  } else { //Only one drink type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
4108  if( !query_yn( _( "Fill the %1$s with %2$s?" ),
4109  keg_name, drink_names[0].c_str() ) ) {
4110  drink_index = -1;
4111  }
4112  }
4113  if( drink_index < 0 ) {
4114  return;
4115  }
4116 
4117  // First empty the keg of foreign objects
4118  displace_items_except_one_liquid( examp );
4119 
4120  //Store liquid chosen in the keg
4121  itype_id drink_type = drink_types[ drink_index ];
4122  int charges_held = you.charges_of( drink_type );
4123  item drink( drink_type, drink_bday[ drink_index ] );
4124  drink.set_relative_rot( drink_rot[ drink_index ] );
4125  drink.charges = 0;
4126  bool keg_full = false;
4127  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
4128  for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !keg_full; i++ ) {
4129  player_character.use_charges( drink.typeId(), 1 );
4130  drink.charges++;
4131  keg_full = drink.volume() >= keg_cap;
4132  }
4133  if( keg_full ) {
4134  add_msg( _( "You completely fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
4135  keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );
4136  } else {
4137  add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
4138  keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );
4139  }
4140  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
4141  here.i_clear( examp );
4142  here.add_item( examp, drink );
4143  return;
4144  } else {
4145  // First empty the keg of foreign objects
4146  displace_items_except_one_liquid( examp );
4147 
4148  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
4149  item &drink = items.only_item();
4150  const std::string drink_tname = drink.tname();
4151  const std::string drink_nname = item::nname( drink.typeId() );
4152  enum options {
4153  DISPENSE,
4154  HAVE_A_DRINK,
4155  REFILL,
4156  };
4157  uilist selectmenu;
4158  //~ $1 - furniture name, $2 - liquid name, $3 - liquid charges, $4 - liquid volume, $5 - liquid capacity
4159  selectmenu.text = string_format( _( "%1$s with %2$s (%3$d) %4$s / %5$s" ),
4160  uppercase_first_letter( keg_name ), drink_tname, drink.charges,
4161  vol_to_string( drink.volume(), true, true ), vol_to_string( keg_cap, true, true ) );
4162  selectmenu.addentry( DISPENSE, drink.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
4163  _( "Dispense or dump %s" ), drink_tname );
4164  selectmenu.addentry( HAVE_A_DRINK, drink.is_food() && drink.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ),
4165  MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Have a drink" ) );
4166  selectmenu.addentry( REFILL, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Refill" ) );
4167  selectmenu.query();
4168 
4169  switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
4170  case DISPENSE:
4171  if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( items.begin(), examp ) ) {
4172  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
4173  drink_tname, keg_name );
4174  }
4175  return;
4176 
4177  case HAVE_A_DRINK:
4178  if( !you.can_consume_as_is( drink ) ) {
4179  return; // They didn't actually drink
4180  }
4181  you.assign_activity( consume_activity_actor( drink ) );
4182  drink.charges--;
4183  if( drink.charges == 0 ) {
4184  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
4185  drink_tname, keg_name );
4186  here.i_clear( examp );
4187  }
4188  return;
4189 
4190  case REFILL: {
4191  if( drink.volume() >= keg_cap ) {
4192  add_msg( _( "The %s is completely full." ), keg_name );
4193  return;
4194  }
4195  int charges_held = you.charges_of( drink.typeId() );
4196  if( charges_held < 1 ) {
4197  add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any %1$s to fill the %2$s with." ),
4198  drink_nname, keg_name );
4199  return;
4200  }
4201  item tmp( drink.typeId(), calendar::turn, charges_held );
4202  pour_into_keg( examp, tmp );
4203  you.use_charges( drink.typeId(), charges_held - tmp.charges );
4204  add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ), keg_name, drink_nname );
4205  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
4206  return;
4207  }
4208 
4209  default:
4210  return;
4211  }
4212  }
4213 }

◆ kiln_empty()

void iexamine::kiln_empty ( Character &  you,
const tripoint &  examp 
)
Fabrication decreases loss when firing a kiln

Definition at line 2883 of file iexamine.cpp.

2884 {
2885  map &here = get_map();
2886  furn_id cur_kiln_type = here.furn( examp );
2887  furn_id next_kiln_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
2888  if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_empty ) {
2889  next_kiln_type = furn_f_kiln_full;
2890  } else if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_metal_empty ) {
2891  next_kiln_type = furn_f_kiln_metal_full;
2892  } else {
2893  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action kiln_empty, but is of type %s",
2894  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2895  return;
2896  }
2897 
2898  static const std::set<material_id> kilnable{ material_wood, material_bone };
2899  bool fuel_present = false;
2900  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2901  for( const item &i : items ) {
2902  if( i.typeId() == itype_charcoal ) {
2903  add_msg( _( "This kiln already contains charcoal." ) );
2904  add_msg( _( "Remove it before firing the kiln again." ) );
2905  return;
2906  } else if( i.made_of_any( kilnable ) ) {
2907  fuel_present = true;
2908  } else {
2909  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This kiln contains %s, which can't be made into charcoal!" ), i.tname( 1,
2910  false ) );
2911  return;
2912  }
2913  }
2914 
2915  if( !fuel_present ) {
2916  add_msg( _( "This kiln is empty. Fill it with wood or bone and try again." ) );
2917  return;
2918  }
2919  // https://energypedia.info/wiki/Charcoal_Production
2920  // charcoal has about 25% of the density of wood, and wood pyrolysis produces about 10-15% charcoal by weight for a stone kiln.
2921  // listed efficiency is for primitive or DIY production, industrial process in a metal kiln is more efficient at 20-25%
2922  // 100% efficient conversion would be 1kg wood = 0.25kg charcoal, 1:1 volume conversion
2923  // fabrication should help here as kiln design and how you stack the wood matter to a degree, though the impact is low overall
2924  // For a cruddy kiln (a pit with a rock chimney) assume 10-15% efficiency, depending on fabrication (40-60% wastage)
2925  // For a well made kiln (industrial-style metal kiln) assume 20-25% efficiency, depending on fabrication (0-20% wastage)
2926  ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a kiln
2927  const float skill = you.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
2928  int loss = 0;
2929  // if the current kiln is a metal one, use a more efficient conversion rate otherwise default to assuming it is a rock pit kiln
2930  if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_metal_empty ) {
2931  loss = 20 - 2 * skill;
2932  } else {
2933  loss = 60 - 2 * skill;
2934  }
2935 
2936  // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2937  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2938  for( const item &i : items ) {
2939  total_volume += i.volume();
2940  }
2941 
2942  const itype *char_type = item::find_type( itype_unfinished_charcoal );
2943  int char_charges = char_type->charges_per_volume( ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100 );
2944  if( char_charges < 1 ) {
2945  add_msg( _( "The batch in this kiln is too small to yield any charcoal." ) );
2946  return;
2947  }
2948 
2949  if( !you.has_charges( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
2950  add_msg( _( "This kiln is ready to be fired, but you have no fire source." ) );
2951  return;
2952  } else {
2953  add_msg( _( "This kiln contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be fired." ),
2954  format_volume( total_volume ), volume_units_abbr() );
2955  if( !query_yn( _( "Fire the kiln?" ) ) ) {
2956  return;
2957  }
2958  }
2959 
2960  you.use_charges( itype_fire, 1 );
2961  here.i_clear( examp );
2962  here.furn_set( examp, next_kiln_type );
2963  item result( "unfinished_charcoal", calendar::turn );
2964  result.charges = char_charges;
2965  here.add_item( examp, result );
2966 
2967  if( you.has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
2968  you.add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 3_hours, 2_hours );
2969  you.rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
2970  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire in the charcoal kiln." ) );
2971  } else {
2972  add_msg( _( "You fire the charcoal kiln." ) );
2973  }
2974 }

3012  "It should take about %d minutes to finish burning.",
3013  minutes ), minutes );

3022  total_volume += item_it->volume();
3023  item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3024  } else {
3025  item_it++;

5455  } else if( !here.valid_move( examp, jump_target, false, true ) ) {

5462  } else {

5464  you.set_activity_level( BRISK_EXERCISE );

5475  tripoint where = examp;
5476  tripoint below = examp;
5477  below.z--;
5478  while( here.valid_move( where, below, false, true ) ) {
5479  where.z--;
5480  below.z--;
5481  }

5487  return;

5492  break;

5497  break;
5498  }
5499  /*case ledge_cling_down: {

5520  case ledge_glide: {
5521  int glide_distance = 5;
5522  const weather_manager &weather = get_weather();
5523  add_msg( m_info, _( "You soar away from the ledge." ) );
5524  int angledifference = std::abs( weather.winddirection - jump_direction * 45 );
5525  // Handle cases where the difference wraps around due to compass directions
5526  angledifference = std::min( angledifference, 360 - angledifference );
5527  if( angledifference <= 45 && weather.windspeed >= 12 ) {
5528  add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your glide is aided by a tailwind." ) );
5529  glide_distance += 1;
5530  }
5531  // Check if the directions are greater than 135 degrees apart
5532  else if( angledifference >= 135 && weather.windspeed >= 12 ) {
5533  add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your glide is hindered by a headwind." ) );
5534  glide_distance -= 1;
5535  }
5536  if( jump_direction == 1 || jump_direction == 3 || jump_direction == 5 || jump_direction == 7 ) {
5537  glide_distance = std::round( 0.7 * glide_distance );
5538  }
5539  you.as_avatar()->grab( object_type::NONE );
5540  glide_activity_actor glide( &you, jump_direction, glide_distance );
5541  you.remove_effect( effect_bouldering );
5542  you.assign_activity( glide );
5543  you.add_effect( effect_gliding, 1_turns, true );
5544  you.setpos( examp );
5545  break;
5546  }
5547  case ledge_fall_down: {
5548  if( query_yn( _( "Climbing might be safer. Really fall from the ledge?" ) ) ) {
5549  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5550  // If player is grabbed, trapped, or somehow otherwise movement-impeded, first try to break free
5551  if( !you.move_effects( false ) ) {
5552  return;
5553  }
5554  // Step into open air, then fall...
5555  if( you.has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_LEVITATION ) ) {
5556  you.add_effect( effect_slow_descent, 1_seconds, false );
5557  }
5558  you.setpos( examp );
5559  you.gravity_check();
5560  } else {
5561  // Just to highlight the trepidation
5562  popup( _( "You decided to step back from the ledge." ) );
5563  }
5564  break;
5565  }
5566  default:
5567  popup( _( "You decided to step back from the ledge." ) );
5568  break;
5569  }
5570 }

1837  examp, "LOCKABLE_DOOR", part_status_flag::available );
1838  if( !parts_at_target.empty() ) {
1839  locked_part = veh->vehicle().next_part_to_unlock(
1840  veh->vehicle().index_of_part( parts_at_target.front() ) );
1841  }
1842  }
1843

1845  locked_part >= 0 ? veh->vehicle().part( locked_part ).name() :
1846  here.tername( examp );
1847  const bool has_prying = !best_prying.is_null();
1848  const bool can_pick = ( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PICKABLE, examp ) ||
1849  locked_part >= 0 ) &&
1850  ( !best_lockpick.is_null() || you.has_bionic( bio_lockpick ) );
1851  enum act {
1852  pick = 0,
1853  pry = 1,
1854  none = 2
1855  };
1856  int action = act::none;
1857 
1858  if( has_prying && can_pick ) {
1859  const int pry_has = best_prying.get_quality( qual_PRY );
1860  const int pry_req = here.has_furn( examp ) ?
1861  here.furn( examp )->prying->prying_data().prying_level :
1862  here.ter( examp )->prying->prying_data().prying_level;
1863  if( pry_has < pry_req ) {
1864  action = act::pick;
1865  } else {
1866  uilist amenu;
1867  amenu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?" ),
1868  target_name );
1869  amenu.addentry( 0, true, 'l', _( "Pick the lock" ) );
1870  amenu.addentry( 1, true, 'p', _( "Pry open" ) );
1871  amenu.query();
1872  if( amenu.ret < act::pick || amenu.ret > act::pry ) {
1873  return;
1874  }
1875  action = amenu.ret;
1876  }
1877  } else {
1878  action = has_prying ? act::pry : can_pick ? act::pick : act::none;
1879  }
1880 
1881  if( action == act::none ) {
1882  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is locked. You could pry it open with the right tool" ),
1883  target_name );
1884  return;
1885  } else if( action == act::pry ) {
1886  //~ %1$s: terrain/furniture name, %2$s: prying tool name
1887  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You attempt to pry open the %1$s using your %2$s" ),
1888  target_name, best_prying.tname() );
1889  iuse::crowbar( &you, &best_prying, examp );
1890  } else if( action == act::pick ) {
1891  locked_object_pickable( you, examp );
1892  }

1909  veh->vehicle().index_of_part( parts_at_target.front() ) );

1914  locked_part >= 0 ? veh->vehicle().part( locked_part ).name() : here.tername( examp );
1915 
1916  if( you.has_bionic( bio_lockpick ) ) {
1917  if( you.get_power_level() >= bio_lockpick->power_activate ) {
1918  you.mod_power_level( -bio_lockpick->power_activate );
1919  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You activate your %s." ), bio_lockpick->name );
1920  you.assign_activity( lockpick_activity_actor::use_bionic( here.getabs( examp ) ) );
1921  return;
1922  } else {
1923  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have enough power to activate your %s." ),
1924  bio_lockpick->name );
1925  }
1926  }
1927 
1928  std::vector<item *> picklocks = you.items_with( [&you]( const item & it ) {
1929  // Don't include worn items such as hairpins
1930  if( !you.is_worn( it ) ) {
1931  return it.type->get_use( "PICK_LOCK" ) != nullptr;
1932  }
1933  return false;
1934  } );
1935 
1936  if( picklocks.empty() ) {
1937  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is locked. If only you had something to pick its lock with" ),
1938  target_name );
1939  return;
1940  }
1941 
1942  // Sort by their picklock level.
1943  std::sort( picklocks.begin(), picklocks.end(), [&]( const item * a, const item * b ) {
1944  int a_quality = a->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK );
1945  int b_quality = b->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK );
1946  // Sort by durability to spend most broken item
1947  if( a_quality == b_quality ) {
1948  return a->damage() > b->damage();
1949  }
1950  return a_quality > b_quality;
1951  } );
1952 
1953  for( item *it : picklocks ) {
1954  if( !query_yn( _( "Pick the lock of %1$s using your %2$s?" ),
1955  target_name, it->tname() ) ) {
1956  return;
1957  }
1958  const use_function *iuse_fn = it->type->get_use( "PICK_LOCK" );
1959  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You attempt to pick the lock of %1$s using your %2$s" ),
1960  target_name, it->tname() );
1961  const ret_val<void> can_use = iuse_fn->can_call( you, *it, examp );
1962  if( can_use.success() ) {
1963  iuse_fn->call( &you, *it, examp );
1964  return;
1965  } else {
1966  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, can_use.str() );
1967  }
1968  }

6380 {
6381  map &here = get_map();
6382  const furn_id cur_mill_type = here.furn( examp );
6383  furn_id next_mill_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
6384  if( cur_mill_type == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6385  next_mill_type = furn_f_wind_mill;
6386  } else if( cur_mill_type == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6387  next_mill_type = furn_f_water_mill;
6388  } else {
6389  debugmsg( "Furniture executed action mill_finalize, but is of type %s",
6390  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
6391  return;
6392  }
6393 
6394  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
6395  if( items.empty() ) {
6396  here.furn_set( examp, next_mill_type );
6397  return;
6398  }
6399 
6400  std::map<itype_id, int> millable_counts;
6401 
6402  for( const item &iter : items ) {
6403  if( iter.type->milling_data && !iter.type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
6404  if( millable_counts.find( iter.typeId() ) == millable_counts.end() ) {
6405  millable_counts.emplace( iter.typeId(), 1 );
6406  } else {
6407  millable_counts[iter.typeId()]++;
6408  }
6409  }
6410  }
6411 
6412  for( std::pair<const string_id<itype>, int> mill_type_count : millable_counts ) {
6413  const item source( mill_type_count.first );
6414  const item product( source.type->milling_data->into_ );
6415  const recipe rec = *source.type->milling_data->recipe_;
6416 
6417  if( rec.is_null() ) {
6418  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It wasn't milled." ),
6419  source.display_name().c_str() );
6420 
6421  } else {
6422  const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &components =
6423  rec.simple_requirements().get_components();
6424  int lot_size = 0;
6425 
6426  // Making the assumption that milling only uses a single type of input product. Support for mixed products would require additional logic.
6427  // We also make the assumption that this is the only relevant input, so if lubricants etc. was to be added more logic would be needed.
6428  for( const std::vector<item_comp> &component : components ) {
6429  for( const item_comp &comp : component ) {
6430  if( comp.type == mill_type_count.first ) {
6431  lot_size = comp.count;
6432  break;
6433  }
6434  }
6435 
6436  if( lot_size > 0 ) {
6437  break;
6438  }
6439  }
6440 
6441  if( lot_size == 0 ) {
6442  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. Milling of it failed." ),
6443  source.display_name().c_str() );
6444  mill_type_count.second = 0;
6445  } else {
6446  const int batches = mill_type_count.second / lot_size;
6447  const int process_count = batches * lot_size;
6448 
6449  if( batches == 0 ) {
6450  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s is milled in batches of %d, so none was processed." ),
6451  source.tname(), lot_size );
6452  } else if( process_count != mill_type_count.second ) {
6453  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s is milled in batches of %d, so %d remained unprocessed." ),
6454  source.tname(), lot_size, mill_type_count.second - batches * lot_size );
6455  }
6456 
6457  mill_type_count.second = process_count;
6458 
6459  item_components item_component_lot;
6460  int count = 0;
6461 
6462  for( item &iter : items ) {
6463  if( iter.typeId() == mill_type_count.first ) {
6464  item_component_lot.add( iter );
6465  count++;
6466  if( count == mill_type_count.second ) {
6467  break;
6468  }
6469  }
6470  }
6471 
6472  std::vector<item> results = rec.create_results( batches, &item_component_lot );
6473 
6474  for( const item &result : results ) {
6475  here.add_item( examp, result );
6476  }
6477 
6478  for( map_stack::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter != items.end(); ) {
6479  item &it = *iter;
6480 
6481  if( it.typeId() == mill_type_count.first && mill_type_count.second > 0 ) {
6482  iter = items.erase( iter );
6483  mill_type_count.second--;
6484  } else {
6485  ++iter;
6486  }
6487  }
6488  }
6489  }
6490  }
6491 
6492  here.furn_set( examp, next_mill_type );
6493 }

◆ nanofab()

void iexamine::nanofab ( Character &  you,

)

TEMPLATE FABRICATORS Generate items from found blueprints.

Definition at line 399 of file iexamine.cpp.

400 {
401  bool table_exists = false;
402  std::list<item_location> on_table;
403  item_location nanofab_template;
404  tripoint spawn_point;
405  map &here = get_map();
406  std::set<itype_id> allowed_template = here.ter( examp )->allowed_template_id;
407  for( const tripoint &valid_location : here.points_in_radius( examp, 1 ) ) {
408  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NANOFAB_TABLE, valid_location ) ) {
409  spawn_point = valid_location;
410  table_exists = true;
411  on_table = here.items_with( valid_location, [&]( const item & it ) {
412  return it.has_flag( flag_NANOFAB_REPAIR );
413  } );
414  break;
415  }
416  }
417  if( !table_exists ) {
418  return;
419  }
420 
421  item new_item;
422  requirement_data reqs;
423 
424  // If there is something on the table that can be repaired suggest to repair that instead of printing something new
425  if( !on_table.empty() ) {
426  new_item = item( on_table.front()->typeId(), calendar::turn );
427  int damage = on_table.front()->damage_level();
428  if( damage <= 0 ) {
429  popup( _( "FABRICATOR COMPLIANT ITEM %s DETECTED, BUT NOT DAMAGED REMOVE WORKING ITEM FROM FABRICATOR" ),
430  new_item.display_name() );
431  sounds::sound( spawn_point, 10, sounds::sound_t::speech,
432  _( "REMOVE WORKING ITEM FROM FABRICATOR." ), true );
433  return;
434  }
435 
436  if( !on_table.front()->empty() ) {
437  popup( _( "ITEM %s DETECTED, CONTENTS OF ITEM WILL BE DESTROYED BY FABRICATOR PLEASE EMPTY ITEM AND RETURN" ),
438  new_item.display_name() );
439  sounds::sound( spawn_point, 10, sounds::sound_t::speech,
440  _( "PLEASE EMPTY ITEM AND RETURN." ), true );
441  return;
442  }
443 
444  sounds::sound( spawn_point, 10, sounds::sound_t::speech,
445  _( "REPAIR INTEGRITY DAMAGE?" ), true );
446  if( !query_yn( _( "FABRICATOR COMPLIANT ITEM %s DETECTED, REPAIR INTEGRITY DAMAGE?" ),
447  new_item.display_name() ) ) {
448  return;
449  }
450 
451  // multiplier for the item being not completely destroyed
452  float dam_mult = .05f * damage;
453 
454  int qty = std::max( 1, static_cast<int>( dam_mult * new_item.volume() / 250_ml ) );
455  std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> requirement_comp_vector;
456  std::vector<std::vector<quality_requirement>> quality_comp_vector;
457  std::vector<std::vector<tool_comp>> tool_comp_vector;
458  std::vector<item_comp> nano_req = { item_comp( itype_nanomaterial, 5 * qty ) };
459  requirement_comp_vector.push_back( nano_req );
460  std::vector<item_comp> item_req = { item_comp( on_table.front()->typeId(), 1 ) };
461  requirement_comp_vector.push_back( item_req );
462  reqs = requirement_data( tool_comp_vector, quality_comp_vector, requirement_comp_vector );
463  } else {
464  //Create a list of the names of all acceptable templates.
465  std::set<std::string> templatenames;
466  for( const itype_id &id : allowed_template ) {
467  templatenames.insert( id->nname( 1 ) );
468  }
469  std::string name_list = enumerate_as_string( templatenames );
470 
471  //Template selection
472  nanofab_template = g->inv_map_splice( [&]( const item & e ) {
473  return std::any_of( allowed_template.begin(), allowed_template.end(),
474  [&e]( const itype_id itid ) {
475  return e.typeId() == itid;
476  } );
477  }, _( "Introduce a compatible template." ), PICKUP_RANGE,
478  _( "You don't have any usable templates.\n\nCompatible templates are: " ) + name_list );
479 
480  if( !nanofab_template ) {
481  return;
482  }
483 
484  new_item = item( nanofab_template->get_var( "NANOFAB_ITEM_ID" ), calendar::turn );
485  int qty = std::max( 1, new_item.volume() / 250_ml );
486  reqs = *nanofab_template->type->template_requirements * qty;
487  }
488 
489  // either way the new item should have the nanofabricator flag
490  if( !new_item.has_flag( flag_NANOFAB_REPAIR ) ) {
491  new_item.set_flag( flag_NANOFAB_REPAIR );
492  }
493 
494  if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( you.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
495  popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
496  return;
497  }
498 
499  // Consume materials
500  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
501  you.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
502  }
503  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
504  you.consume_tools( e );
505  }
506  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
507 
508  if( new_item.is_armor() && new_item.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) ) {
509  new_item.set_flag( flag_FIT );
510  }
511 
512  here.add_item_or_charges( spawn_point, new_item );
513 
514  // if this template is single use
515  // also check if the template exists at all
516  if( nanofab_template && nanofab_template->has_flag( flag_NANOFAB_TEMPLATE_SINGLE_USE ) ) {
517  nanofab_template.remove_item();
518  }
519 }

5357  return l->ammo_remaining() > r->ammo_remaining();
5358  } );
5359  for( item * const &cc : cash_cards ) {

5361  break;
5362  }

5365  amount_money -= transfer;
5366  }
5367  if( amount_money ) {

5370  }
5371  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your cash cards now hold %s." ),

6793  f_check = true;
6794  f_volume += it.volume();

6830  _( "Apply brake to mill" ),

6832  }
6833 
6834  smenu.query();
6835 
6836  switch( smenu.ret ) {
6837  case 0: { //inspect mill
6838  std::string pop;
6839  if( active ) {
6840  pop = colorize( _( "There's a mill here. It is turning and milling." ), c_green ) + "\n";

6842  pop += string_format( _( "It should take about %s to finish milling." ),
6843  to_string_clipped( time_left ) ) + "\n";
6844  }
6845  } else {
6846  pop += colorize( _( "There's a mill here." ), c_green ) + "\n";
6847  }
6848  pop += colorize( _( "You inspect its contents and find: " ), c_green ) + "\n\n";
6849  if( items_here.empty() ) {
6850  pop += _( "that it is empty." );
6851  } else {
6852  for( const item &it : items_here ) {
6853  if( it.typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6854  pop += "\n" + colorize( _( "You see some grains that are not yet milled to fine flour." ),
6855  c_red ) + "\n";
6856  continue;
6857  }
6858  pop += "-> " + it.display_name() + "\n";
6859  }
6860  }
6861  popup( pop, PF_NONE );
6862  break;
6863  }
6864  case 1:
6865  //activate
6866  if( active ) {
6867  add_msg( _( "It is already milling." ) );
6868  } else {
6869  mill_activate( you, examp );
6870  }
6871  break;
6872  case 2:
6873  // load food
6874  mill_load_food( you, examp, remaining_capacity );
6875  break;
6876  case 3:
6877  // remove food
6878  for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
6879  if( it->typeId() != itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6880  // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
6881  const int handling_cost = -you.item_handling_cost( *it );
6882 
6883  add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the mill." ), it->tname() );
6884  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *it );
6885  it = items_here.erase( it );
6886  you.mod_moves( handling_cost );
6887  } else {
6888  ++it;
6889  }
6890  }
6891  if( active ) {
6892  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6893  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_water_mill );
6894  } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6895  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_wind_mill );
6896  }
6897  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the milling process." ) );
6898  }
6899  break;
6900  default:
6901  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
6902  break;
6903  case 4:
6904  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6905  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_water_mill );
6906  } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6907  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_wind_mill );
6908  }

◆ safe()

void iexamine::safe ( Character &  you,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Attempt to crack safe through audio-feedback manual lock manipulation.

Try to unlock the safe by moving the dial and listening for the mechanism to "click into place." Time per attempt affected by perception and mechanics. 30 minutes per attempt minimum. Small chance of just guessing the combo without listening device.

Definition at line 1776 of file iexamine.cpp.

1777 {
1778  bool has_cracking_tool = you.has_flag( json_flag_SAFECRACK_NO_TOOL );
1779  // short-circuit to avoid the more expensive iteration over items
1780  has_cracking_tool = has_cracking_tool || you.cache_has_item_with( flag_SAFECRACK );
1781 
1782  if( !has_cracking_tool ) {
1783  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
1784  // Assume a 3 digit 100-number code. Many safes allow adjacent + 1 dial locations to match,
1785  // so 1/20^3, or 1/8,000 odds.
1786  // Additionally, safes can be left-handed or right-handed, doubling the problem space.
1787  // The dialing procedures for safes vary, I'm estimating 5 procedures.
1788  // See https://hoogerhydesafe.com/resources/combination-lock-dialing-procedures/
1789  // At the end of the day, that means a 1 / 80,000 chance per attempt.
1790  // If someone is interested, they can feel free to add a proficiency for
1791  // "safe recognition" to mitigate or eliminate this 2x and 5x factor.
1792  if( one_in( 80000 ) ) {
1793  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You mess with the dial for a little bit and it opens!" ) );
1794  get_map().furn_set( examp, furn_f_safe_o );
1795  return;
1796  } else {
1797  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mess with the dial for a little bit." ) );
1798  return;
1799  }
1800  }
1801 
1802  if( you.is_deaf() ) {
1803  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't crack a safe while deaf!" ) );
1804  return;
1805  } else if( you.has_effect( effect_earphones ) ) {
1806  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't crack a safe while listening to music!" ) );
1807  return;
1808  } else if( query_yn( _( "Attempt to crack the safe?" ) ) ) {
1809  you.assign_activity( safecracking_activity_actor( examp ) );
1810  }
1811 }

4921  popup( _( "You're illiterate, and can't read the message on the sign." ) );
4922  } else if( previous_signage_exists ) {

4926  }
4927

4929  std::vector<tool_comp> tools;
4930  std::vector<const item *> filter = you.crafting_inventory().items_with( []( const item & it ) {
4931  return it.has_flag( flag_WRITE_MESSAGE ) && it.charges > 0;
4932  } );
4933  tools.reserve( filter.size() );
4934  for( const item *writing_item : filter ) {
4935  tools.emplace_back( writing_item->typeId(), 1 );
4936  }
4937  if( !tools.empty() ) {
4938  // Different messages if the sign already has writing associated with it.

4941  _( "Add a message to the sign?" );

4946  .identifier( "signage" )
4947  .query_string();

4949  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, ignore_message );

4952  _( "You overwrite the previous message on the sign with your graffiti." ) :
4953  _( "You graffiti a message onto the sign." );
4954  here.set_signage( examp, signage );

4957  you.consume_tools( tools, 1 );
4958  }
4959  } else {
4960  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, ignore_message );

6974  const bool full = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME;
6975  const bool full_portable = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE;

6980  const int need_charges = get_charcoal_charges( f_volume );

6982  !ammo_list[0]->ammo ? 0 : item( type ).ammo_capacity( ammo_list[0]->ammo->type );
6983  const bool has_coal = coal_charges > 0;
6984  const bool has_enough_coal = coal_charges >= need_charges;
6985

6994  empty ? _( "Light up and smoke food insert some food for smoking first" ) :
6995  !has_enough_coal ? string_format(
6996  _( "Light up and smoke food need extra %d charges of charcoal" ),
6997  need_charges - coal_charges ) :
6998  _( "Light up and smoke food" ),
6999  _( "Light up the smoking rack and start smoking. Smoking will take about 6 hours." ) );

7002  full_portable ? _( "Insert food for smoking smoking rack is full" ) :

7004  format_volume( remaining_capacity_portable ), volume_units_abbr() ),
7005  _( "Fill the smoking rack with raw meat, fish or sausages for smoking or fruit or vegetable or smoked meat for drying." ) );
7006

7008  active ? _( "You cannot disassemble this smoking rack while it is active!" ) :
7009  _( "Disassemble the smoking rack" ), "" );

7011  } else {

7013  full ? _( "Insert food for smoking smoking rack is full" ) :
7014  string_format( _( "Insert food for smoking remaining capacity is %s %s" ),
7015  format_volume( remaining_capacity ), volume_units_abbr() ),
7016  _( "Fill the smoking rack with raw meat, fish or sausages for smoking or fruit or vegetable or smoked meat for drying." ) );
7017  }
7018

7021  }

7023  smenu.addentry_desc( 3, has_coal_in_inventory && coal_charges < max_charges, 'r',
7024  !has_coal_in_inventory ? _( "Reload with charcoal you don't have any" ) :
7025  ( coal_charges >= max_charges ? _( "Reload with charcoal at maximum capacity" ) :
7026  _( "Reload with charcoal" ) ),
7027  string_format(
7028  _( "You need %d charges of charcoal for %s %s of food. Minimal amount of charcoal is %d charges." ),
7029  sm_rack::CHARCOAL_PER_LITER, format_volume( 1_liter ), volume_units_long(),
7030  sm_rack::MIN_CHARCOAL ) );
7031 
7032  } else {
7033  smenu.addentry_desc( 7, true, 'x',
7034  _( "Quench burning charcoal" ),
7035  _( "Quenching will stop smoking process, but also destroy all used charcoal." ) );
7036  }
7037 
7038  if( has_coal ) {
7039  smenu.addentry( 5, true, 'c',
7040  active ? string_format( _( "Rake out %d excess charges of charcoal from smoking rack" ),
7041  coal_charges ) :
7042  string_format( _( "Remove %d charges of charcoal from smoking rack" ), coal_charges ) );
7043  }
7044 
7045  smenu.query();
7046 
7047  switch( smenu.ret ) {
7048  case 0: { //inspect smoking rack
7049  std::string pop;
7050  if( active ) {
7051  pop += colorize( _( "There's a smoking rack here. It is lit and smoking." ), c_green ) + "\n";
7052  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
7053  if( minutes_left > 60 ) {
7054  pop += string_format( n_gettext( "It will finish smoking in about %d hour.",
7055  "It will finish smoking in about %d hours.",
7056  hours_left ), hours_left ) + "\n\n";
7057  } else if( minutes_left > 30 ) {
7058  pop += _( "It will finish smoking in less than an hour." ) + std::string( "\n" );
7059  } else {
7060  pop += string_format( n_gettext( "It should take about %d minute to finish smoking.",
7061  "It should take about %d minutes to finish smoking.",
7062  minutes_left ), minutes_left ) + "\n ";
7063  }
7064  }
7065  } else {
7066  pop += colorize( _( "There's a smoking rack here." ), c_green ) + "\n";
7067  }
7068  pop += colorize( _( "You inspect its contents and find: " ), c_green ) + "\n";
7069  if( items_here.empty() ) {
7070  pop += _( "that it is empty." );
7071  } else {
7072  for( const item &it : items_here ) {
7073  if( it.typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
7074  pop += "\n" + colorize( _( "You see some smoldering embers there." ), c_red ) + "\n";
7075  continue;
7076  }
7077  pop += "-> " + it.display_name() + "\n";
7078  }
7079  }
7080  popup( pop, PF_NONE );
7081  break;
7082  }
7083  case 1:
7084  //activate
7085  if( active ) {
7086  add_msg( _( "It is already lit and smoking." ) );
7087  } else {
7088  smoker_activate( you, examp );
7089  }
7090  break;
7091  case 2:
7092  // load food
7093  if( portable ) {
7094  smoker_load_food( you, examp, remaining_capacity_portable );
7095  } else {
7096  smoker_load_food( you, examp, remaining_capacity );
7097  }
7098  break;
7099  case 3:
7100  // load charcoal
7101  reload_furniture( you, examp, false );
7102  break;
7103  case 4:
7104  // remove food
7105  rem_f_opt = true;
7106  /* fallthrough */
7107  case 5: {
7108  //remove charcoal
7109  for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
7110  if( ( rem_f_opt && it->is_food() ) || ( !rem_f_opt && ( it->typeId() == itype_charcoal ) ) ) {
7111  // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
7112  const int handling_cost = -you.item_handling_cost( *it );
7113 
7114  add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the rack." ), it->tname() );
7115  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *it );
7116  it = items_here.erase( it );
7117  you.mod_moves( handling_cost );
7118  } else {
7119  ++it;
7120  }
7121  }
7122  if( portable && active && rem_f_opt ) {
7123  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
7124  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7125  } else if( active && rem_f_opt ) {
7126  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_smoking_rack );
7127  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7128  }
7129  }
7130  break;
7131  default:
7132  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
7133  break;
7134  case 7:
7135  if( portable ) {
7136  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
7137  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7138  } else {
7139  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_smoking_rack );
7140  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7141  }
7142  break;
7143  case 8:
7144  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
7145  deployed_furniture( you, examp );
7146  break;
7147  }
7148 }

3239  item result( it.get_comestible()->smoking_result, it.birthday() );
3240  recipe rec;
3241  result.inherit_flags( it, rec );
3242  if( !result.has_flag( flag_NUTRIENT_OVERRIDE ) ) {
3243  // If the item has "cooks_like" it will be replaced by that item as a component.

3245  // Set charges to 1 for stacking purposes.

3252  }

4382  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
4383  for( item &it : items ) {
4384  if( it.will_spill() || it.is_watertight_container() ) {
4385  container = &it;
4386 
4387  it.visit_items( [&charges, &has_sap]( const item * it, item * ) {
4388  if( it->typeId() == itype_maple_sap ) {
4389  has_sap = true;
4390  charges = it->charges;
4391  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
4392  }
4393  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
4394  } );
4395  }
4396  if( it.get_quality_nonrecursive( qual_TREE_TAP ) > 0 ) {
4397  spile = &it;
4398  }
4399  }
4400 
4401  if( !spile ) {
4402  return;
4403  }
4404 
4405  enum options {
4406  REMOVE_TAP,
4407  ADD_CONTAINER,
4408  HARVEST_SAP,
4409  REMOVE_CONTAINER,
4410  };
4411  uilist selectmenu;
4412  selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_TAP, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Remove tap" ) );
4413  selectmenu.addentry( ADD_CONTAINER, !container, MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
4414  _( "Add a container to receive the %s" ), maple_sap_name );
4415  selectmenu.addentry( HARVEST_SAP, has_sap, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Harvest current %s (%d)" ),
4416  maple_sap_name, charges );
4417  selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_CONTAINER, container, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Remove container" ) );
4418 
4419  selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
4420  selectmenu.query();
4421 
4422  switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
4423  case REMOVE_TAP: {
4424  if( !you.crafting_inventory().has_quality( qual_HAMMER ) ) {
4425  add_msg( m_info, _( "You need a hammering tool to remove the %s from the crust." ),
4426  spile->tname() );
4427  return;
4428  }
4429 
4430  add_msg( _( "You remove the %s." ), spile->tname() );
4431  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *spile );
4432 
4433  if( container ) {
4434  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *container );
4435  }
4436  here.i_clear( examp );
4437 
4438  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) );
4439  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_tree_maple );
4440 
4441  return;
4442  }
4443 
4444  case ADD_CONTAINER: {
4445  item_location cont_loc = maple_tree_sap_container();
4446 
4447  container = cont_loc.get_item();
4448  if( container ) {
4449  here.add_item_or_charges( examp, *container, false );
4450  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( *container ) );
4451  add_msg( m_info, _( "You hang the %s under the spile to collect sap." ), container->tname() );
4452  cont_loc.remove_item();
4453  } else {
4454  add_msg( m_info, _( "No container added. The sap will just spill on the ground." ) );
4455  }
4456 
4457  return;
4458  }
4459 
4460  case HARVEST_SAP: {
4461  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_container( *container, PICKUP_RANGE );
4462  return;
4463  }
4464 
4465  case REMOVE_CONTAINER: {
4466  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *container );
4467  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( *container ) );
4468  here.i_rem( examp, container );
4469  return;
4470  }
4471 
4472  default:
4473  return;
4474  }
4475 }

Generates vending machine UI and allows players to purchase contained items with a cash card.

1025 {
1026  constexpr int moves_cost = to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );

1028  map_stack vend_items = get_map().i_at( examp );
1029 
1030  if( vend_items.empty() ) {
1031  add_msg( m_info, _( "The vending machine is empty." ) );
1032  return;
1033  }
1034 
1035  if( !money ) {
1036  popup( _( "You need some money on a cash card to buy things." ) );
1037  }
1038

1040  int w_info_w = 0;
1041  int list_lines = 0;
